column5: can canada "REMOTE BORDER PASS" be puchased on line???can a non resident canadian fishing license be puchased on line also??? thanks TERRY

I don't think you can get one on line. Call 807 274 3815 and order one. MC or Visa only. They will fax one but they would rather send it by mail. Don't get caught on their side of the Rainy without on, the fine is $100. Good luck fishing, the shinners are not in the river yet. Dick
